metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9261 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
huft_build in archival/libarchive/decompress_gunzip.c in BusyBox before 1.27.2 misuses a pointer, causing segfaults and an application crash during an unzip operation on a specially crafted ZIP file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9261` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3
busybox-static - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3
udhcpc - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3
udhcpd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3').
